battery: Two LR6/L40 (AA-size) alkaline batteries (supplied), Two FR6/L91 (AA-size) lithium batteries (optional), Two EN-MH2 rechargeable Ni-MH batteries (optional), MH-72/MH-73 Battery Charger (optional)
file formats: Still pictures: JPEGMovies: MOV (Video: MPEG-4 AVC/H.264, Audio: LPCM stereo)
focus range: [W]: Approx. 50 cm (1 ft 8 in.) to infinity, Macro mode: Approx. 1 cm (0.4 in.) to infinity
lens: NIKKOR lens; 4.5-63.0 mm (35mm [135] format equivalent: 25-350 mm); f/3.3-5.9
shutter: 1/1600-1 sec. (when ISO sensitivity set to Auto)1/4000 sec. (maximum speed during high-speed continuous shooting)4 sec. (when scene mode is set to Fireworks show)
white balance modes: Auto, Cloudy, Daylight, Flash, Fluorescent, Incandescent, Preset Manual
